History

Founded in 2002 , the school is a venture of the “Abhyudaya Educational Trust”. Since it’s inception , the school has grown and established a reputation for incorporating innovative and modern methods of the teaching and learning process; not to mention academic excellence.

The school is nested amidst 30 acres of lush green environs offering its students a first hand experience with nature; thus providing an opportunity for “interactive learning”.

Defining Moments of India International School

  • We take great pride on being awarded the ISA (INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL AWARD) from 2008 – 2019. Been awarded the Best Infrastructure Award 2017 – 18.
  • Awarded India’s Top 20 Day cum Boarding School Award.
  • IIS is proud of it’s little champs who have won Gold & laurels at various National and State Level Athletic Meets.
  • Pre Activity Centres located at Outer Ring Road & Koramangala.
  • State of the art infrastructure for both Sports and other Co-curricular activities

We are accredited with the following

ICSE

Indian Certificate of Secondary Examination

Read More
IBDP

International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme

Read More
IGCSE

International General Certificate of Secondary Education

Read More

Our Philosophy

We at India India International School believe in

  • The student’s best interests will be at the centre of all decision making.
  • Students are naturally inquisitive and will learn most effectively through an inquiry driven curriculum.
  • We follow the Gardner’s multiple intelligence theory of teaching which helps students achieve their full potential through a creative, differentiated, challenging and planned process of teaching and learning.
  • Students’ learning should be celebrated at every possible opportunity.
  • Parents, children and the school form a unique partnership to support successful learning.
  • Students need strategies to successfully prepare them for the many and varied challenges (academic and social) that they will have to manage at different stages of their lives.
  • Students thrive in a supportive, happy and safe environment in which they are valued and respected.
  • Global perspectives and understandings will be encouraged and taught in an age appropriate, open minded fashion.
  • Teachers employed at India International School will embrace and contribute to the ethos of the school.

Vision

To provide quality, comprehensive education and raise compassionate global citizens.

Mission

To facilitate life-long learning beyond knowledge acquisition by providing them skills to comprehend, apply, appreciate, analyze, synthesize and evaluate.

Motto & Slogan

IIS is a nurturing home for children from all walks of life the world-over, where each child’s multiple skills are sharpened to the zenith. We strive to give them a conducive

environment and a value enriched education,while nurturing them into responsible and confident individuals who will make an effective contribution to the society.
